sentences.english: The 2010 World Cup team nicknames are presented by country alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 2010年世界盃球隊暱稱按國家字母順序排名。

sentences.english: QQ nickname still corresponds to the "Voice of God."
sentences.chinese: 暱稱仍爲QQ相對應的“上帝之音”。

sentences.english: In this environment, the nickname is mapped to a collection of items posted to an external queue.
sentences.chinese: 在此環境中，暱稱映射到提交給外部隊列的項的集合。

sentences.english: The query in question should reference at least one nickname.
sentences.chinese: 查詢應該引用至少一個暱稱。

sentences.english: The view itself is based on a nickname.
sentences.chinese: 視圖本身基於一個暱稱。

sentences.english: Somewhere around 200,suppose that my friends give me a nickname.
sentences.chinese: 大約200歲時，我的朋友們給了我一個暱稱。

sentences.english: I am trying to start my life over and that means leaving the nickname 'Imperatore' behind.
sentences.chinese: 我開始過新的生活，我要徹底拋棄‘國王’這個暱稱。

sentences.english: Then, pay attention to the blue word nickname, is already deleted your friends.
sentences.chinese: 接着，注意藍字暱稱，就是已經刪你好友的人。

sentences.english: Instead, the site requires a nickname and authentication remote key.
sentences.chinese: 相反，站點需要一個暱稱和遠程認證密鑰。

sentences.english: We will also provide an example of using the nickname.
sentences.chinese: 我們還將給出一個使用暱稱的示例。

sentences.english: The nickname cannot be empty as it is used as a unique identifier.
sentences.chinese: 暱稱無法是清空它爲使用的唯一識別符。

definition: that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
Zen saying repeated as cant/(fig.) catchphrase/mantra/favorite expression/stock phrase
lit. to open the door and see the mountain; fig. to get right to the point (idiom)
